sndlib.core.solution
Class Solution

java.lang.Object
  sndlib.core.solution.Solution

public final class Solution
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a solution for a specific network design problem.

A Solution encapsulates all information about a solution, such as the installed link capacities and the demand routings used in the several states. It can be coupled with a Problem using a SolvedProblem to check its consistency and feasibility or to compute statistics.

In a Solution the following invariant is maintained:

  • for all links contained in any flow path of the solution's demand routings there also exists a link configuration in the solution

Author:
Roman Klaehne
See Also:
DemandRouting, LinkConfiguration, SolvedProblem, SolutionValidators, SolutionStatistics

newRouting

public DemandRouting newRouting(java.lang.String demandId,
                                OperatingState state)
Constructs a new DemandRouting for the specified demand in this solution. The routing is assumed to be used when the network is in the given operating state.

Parameters:
demandId - the ID of the demand for which the routing is constructed
state - the operating state
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if this solution already contains a routing in the given operating state for the specified demand

newFlowPath

public FlowPath newFlowPath(DemandRouting routing,
                            double flowPathValue,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> path)
Constructs a new FlowPath having the specified flow value and running along a path specified by the given list of link ID's.
The flow path is added to the given demand routing.

Parameters:
routing - the routing the created flow path will be added to
flowPathValue - the flow value
path - a list containing the ID's of the links forming the path
Returns:
the new FlowPath instance
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given flow path value is lower than zero
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given list of link ID's is empty
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the given routing does not belong to this solution
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if for any link in the given path there is no corresponding link configuration in this solution.

                            double flowPathValue,
                            java.lang.String... path)

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given list of link ID's is empty
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the given routing does not belong to this solution
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if for any link in the given path there is no corresponding link configuration in this solution.

linkConfigs

public java.util.Collection<LinkConfiguration> linkConfigs()
Returns a Collection view of the link configurations in this solution.

The returned collection is unmodifiable. That means that each attempt to modify the collection will cause an UnsupportedOperationException.

Returns:
an unmodifiable collection view of the link configurations in this solution.

routings

public java.util.Collection<DemandRouting> routings(OperatingState state)
Returns a Collection view of the demand routings which are used when the network is in the given state.

Returns:
a collection view of the demand routings which are used when the network is in the given state

allRoutings

public java.util.Map<OperatingState,java.util.Collection<DemandRouting>> allRoutings()
Returns a Map view of all demand routings in this solution. The map keys referencing the operating states and the corresponding demand routings are exactly those as they were created in this solution. The returned map is unmodifiable. That means that each attempt to modify the map will cause an UnsupportedOperationException

Returns:
an unmodifiable map view of al demand routings in this solution

Returns a textual representation of this solution.
